ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: Limiting it to 1500 AT A TIME would be a good idea.  If the server has 1500 when you log on, then it sucks to be you.  Make another character on another
ygData.messageBody:
Limiting it to 1500 AT A TIME would be a good idea. If the server has
1500 when you log on, then it sucks to be you. Make another character
on another server. Serves you right for loggin off! he he he (what do
you mean, you have a life outside of EQ?).

It would benefit those currently playing on the server.. but I guess
there is no solution to help the number of people currently existing on
a server right now. (besides preventing further account creations for
the older servers...)

Baelstorm

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Azor [SMTP:jmaynus@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 12:34 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question
>
> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
> I disagree on the moving anyone on lvl 10 and below to another server.
> How
> would you feel if you were Lvl 10 or below and you had friends say on
> 12 and
> up, next thing you know you're on another server and they are still on
> that
> one and you can't group or talk to them anymore? I think only 500
> per-server is too little, I'd say 1,000 to 1,500 is cool I'd take
> 1,950 to
> 2,000 if they'd put in more places for us to go and hunt and give us
> more
> cool items to loot. I heard the Glowing Crook you get off Lock Jaw
> can be a
> pain cause 20+ Wizards kill the steal and get the Crook. Thats
> something
> else they need to fix, I mean how is it right for me as a Cleric to be
> beating the crap outta something and a powerful Wizard comes along and
> with
> one blast kills it and gets the exp and the loot? Are Wizards too
> powerful,
> seems like it too me, I know a Wizard that on Lvl 12 was doing over
> 100 dmg
> to things with one cast of a magic spell. I on Lvl 16 get's lucky to
> do 76
> dmg to somethings with one cast of a spell.
>
> **************************
> Azor
> Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> **************************
>
> > From: Lanadina the Magician <lanadina@...>
> >
> > I couldnt agree with you more!!!! Last night Fennin Ro had OVER 1950
> people
> > on that ONE server!!!!!! They need to lock that server down
> completely and
> > possibly move any level 10 and below character over to another
> server.
> > Personally, I don't think ANY server should have more than 500
> people on
> it.
> >
> > Also, they need to have more than one zone carry certain 'very
> saught'
> after
> > items, such as Rubicite armor. Why does Cazic Thule have to be the
> only
> > zone? Of COURSE there will be 70-100 people in the zone! Move the
> Ruby
> > around...put some in Rathe Mountains, make a level 25+ zone on
> Erudin so
> > Ruby can drop there....but not all in one zone. Look at the
> Journeyman
> > boots. ONE NPC in the entire game has it, its a no drop item,
> meaning you
> > have to loot it yourself. Why cant this npc drop it everytime to
> stop
> > overcamping and people from Kill stealing? No, that would make way
> too
> much
> > sense, I guess.
> >
> > Over camping and lagging CAN end if some of the ideas that so many
> have
> sent
> > in are implemented. But of course, that would cause Verant having to
> > actually DO something...can't have that. (naww...I'm not upset heheh
> <grin>)
> >
> > Lanadina
>
